item.title: How to watch the Scripps National Spelling Bee—and how much money is on the line
item.description: 99 young quarterfinalists are left to duke it out.

item.title: Macy’s latest earnings show the CEO’s turnaround plan is working despite a looming tariff threat
item.description: Wall Street thinks it could have been much worse for the beleaguered department store chain.

item.title: Nonprofits are finally figuring out how to get disillusioned Gen Zers to fix their own communities: You just have to give them money
item.description: It's the latest example of how organizations are trying to empower and encourage Gen Z to get involved in philanthropy.

item.title: Exclusive: Stablecoin company Conduit raises $36 million from Dragonfly Capital and Altos Ventures
item.description: The company will use the money raised to expand into Asia and diversify its client base.
